author: Niklas H
title: Great hotel with friendly staff
text:
A really nice hotel that I'm sure I will return to the next time I travel to Rome.
Excellent location smack right in the middle of everything, with a short walk to a large number of attractions and sights.
Everyone in the staff was very friendly and helpful, and the rooms were excellent, with a beautiful open staircase between the floors.
Very well cleaned, spacious rooms (ours was, at least), and really comfortable bed.
The minibar was filled with free water, beer, juice and snacks, which was a very nice touch.
Breakfast was also really nice, with a nice variety of choices.
Heartily recommended!
